prod_desc: Add another useful piece to your LEGO® collection with this Sand Baseplate!
prod_long_desc:
Whether you’re creating a beach, zoo, desert, or something of your own imagination, this sand-colored 32x32-stud baseplate is the perfect starting point for building, displaying, and playing with your LEGO® creations.
Measures 32x32 studs or 10'' x 10'' 
A great supplement to any LEGO® collection!
